mainPageSecondaryText: The first online booking service for Almaty’s establishments
mainPageDividerText: Access to all of Almaty’s finest places in one service!
mainPagePitchPhrase: Booking has never been this easy!
guaranteeOfGoodTime: Guarantee of a time well spent. Only in a few clicks.
iconEntertainmentOnEveryTaste: There are places that suit every taste, and among them you will surely find the <0>one for you</0>.
iconNoNeedToCall: No need to call anywhere - we will do everything <0>in your stead</0>.
whereShouldGoAnswer: Each and every one of us has this question pop at least sometimes - not everyone finds an answer for it, though. ORYN was created for such adventurers in order to help them with finding the best places Almaty can offer.
wheretoCallAnswer: If you’re with ORYN, you don’t have to call anyone. You choose the place, ORYN handles the rest. You don’t have to worry about the tedious process of booking - just leave it in our hands and look forward to having the time of your life!
